title: Sacramento Kings CEO on SPAC Listing
itunes:title: Sacramento Kings CEO on SPAC Listing
description:
Vivek Ranadivé, CEO of the Sacramento Kings and Founder and Managing Director of Bow Capital Management, talks about their SPAC listing. He also discusses traits of successful entrepreneurs.

Hosts: Carol Massar and Jason Kelly. Producer: Doni Holloway.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
